Title: Induction Therapy
Des: Upon restoring HP, deals <color=#0E70BD>60000</color> True DMG to all units on the battlefield. This effect has a 1s cooldown.

Title: Grand Entrance
Des: Upon entering battle, character gains <color=#0E70BD>30%</color> Extra DMG Reduction and <color=#0E70BD>30%</color> Extra DMG Bonus for 8s.

Title: Space Dominator
Des: Enemies are not affected by Matrix.

Title: Proliferation
Des: When an enemy in battle is taken down or after the battle has started for <color=#0E70BD>30s</color>, an <color=#0E70BD>identical enemy</color> will spawn.

Title: Descending Energy
Des: Once in battle, character's <color=#0E70BD>Extra DMG Bonus decreases by 20%</color> every <color=#0E70BD>10s</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#0E70BD>5 times</color>, and is reset each time a new character is switched in.

Title: Death Battle
Des: Parrying the Mother's attack successfully will deal Extra DMG equal to <color=#0E70BD>2%</color> of Mother's max HP. Failed parry attempt will increase Mother's ATK by <color=#0E70BD>10%</color>.

Title: Angel's Silhouette
Des: When player dodges an attack, a clone of Gabriel will be summoned to <color=#0E70BD>attack the player if the player goes within 5m</color>. The clone summon has a 3s cooldown.

Title: Violent Storm
Des: Voodoo enters Burst Phase periodically. During Burst Phase, Voodoo will gain increased DMG Reduction and <color=#0E70BD>cast lightning</color> near player. Damage Voodoo <color=#0E70BD>70</color> times during Burst Phase to interrupt it.

Title: Quick Maneuver
Des: Character recovers Dodge Gauge <color=#0E70BD>50%</color> faster.

Title: Rift Splash
Des: Dodging an attack successfully will deal True DMG to the attacker equal to <color=#0E70BD>5%</color> of their max HP.

Title: Vulnerability Loading
Des: Dodging an enemy attack will increase the attacker's DMG dealt and taken by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color> for 10s.

Title: Energy Compensation
Des: When Dodge is <color=#0E70BD>above 70%</color>, character's Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color>. When Dodge is <color=#0E70BD>below 70%</color>, character's Extra DMG Bonus decreases by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color>.

Title: Neuro Degeneration
Des: After entering the battle for <color=#0E70BD>10s</color>, character loses <color=#0E70BD>200</color> Dodge Gauge every second.

Title: Flawless Wings
Des: Pterygota Queen's wings <color=#0E70BD>cannot be damaged</color> in phase 2.

Title: The Monarch's Choice
Des: When Qu casts a skill, she will choose between two options: <color=#0E70BD>Flash first then cast the skill</color>, or <color=#0E70BD>cast the skill first, then Flash and cast the skill again</color>.

Title: Physical Soothing
Des: Fu Shen casts Grab Skill <color=#0E70BD>more frequently</color>.

Title: Trickery's End
Des: Defeat <color=#0E70BD>Lilith</color>

Title: Protocol Amplification
Des: Character's Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#0E70BD>3%</color> for every <color=#0E70BD>10%</color> HP left.

Title: Sustainability
Des: Pinging <color=#0E70BD>1/2/3</color> Signal Orbs will heal the character for <color=#0E70BD>5%/10%/15%</color> of max HP.

Title: Predation
Des: When any unit deals DMG, if the DMG dealer has <color=#0E70BD>higher HP percentage</color> than the receiver, the Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color>.

Title: Critical Transition
Des: Characters with HP above <color=#0E70BD>50%</color> deal and take <color=#0E70BD>30%</color> more DMG. Characters with HP below <color=#0E70BD>50%</color> have their healing increased by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color>.

Title: Perfectionism
Des: Character deals <color=#0E70BD>30% more</color> DMG when HP is <color=#0E70BD>above 90%</color>.

Title: Black & White Sharks
Des: Every <color=#0E70BD>10s</color>, the White Shark will transform into a Black Shark, <color=#0E70BD>dealing more DMG but also taking more DMG</color>. When player is <color=#0E70BD>attacked by the Black Shark</color>, Shark-speare will exit the Black Shark state.

Title: Thorny Punishment
Des: Once generated, Iron Maiden's thorns will <color=#0E70BD>launch a rain of swords every 6s</color> to attack player.

Title: Herd Warfare
Des: Moon Eater now appears together with a Mechanoid Moon Eater that will <color=#0E70BD>respawn</color> upon defeat. When Moon Eater is taken down, it will <color=#0E70BD>possess Mechanoid Moon Eater and inherit its HP</color>. The battle is won when Moon Eater is taken down for <color=#0E70BD>3 times</color>.

Title: Signal Harmony
Des: For each orb pinged, character gains <color=#0E70BD>1%</color> DMG Bonus for 8s, stacking up to <color=#0E70BD>20%</color>. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Title: Extreme Maneuver
Des: Within <color=#0E70BD>5s</color> after entering the battle, character's Dodge Gauge recovers <color=#0E70BD>100%</color> faster.

Title: Data Restoration
Des: At the beginning of a battle, all surviving characters recover <color=#0E70BD>70%</color> of their max HP.

Title: Vulnerable Structure
Des: Enemies take increased Physical DMG.
